# GET Weapons

Get a list of weapons, stats, and skins  
More info at [https://dash.valorant-api.com/endpoints/weapons](https://dash.valorant-api.com/endpoints/weapons)  


Method: `GET`  
URL: `https://valorant-api.com/v1/weapons`
